text: allahanu nim'mannu mannininda mattu a balika viryadinda srstisidanu mattu nim'mannu jotegalagi madidanu. Avana arivinallillade yava hennu garbha dharisuvudilla, heruvudu illa. Obba vyaktiya vayas'sinalli aguva heccalavirali, avana vayas'sinallaguva kaditavirali, ellavu ondu granthadalli dakhalagide. Idellavu allahana palige khandita sulabhavagide
